E learning website of NCC ARMY

This was the first website i wrote . I started writing CSS from scratch and i rewrote the webpage twice or thrice .:) . This website was designed for NCC ARMY of SVCE .
This website has which is developed for learning almost all NCC commands,their gestures and fundamentals of NCC.
The multimedia tutorials were shot with the help of my Seniors.
These tutorials were developed aiming to reduce the amount of time in training a NCC cadet.
  •

Made using

PHP .HTML .CSS .Javascript .Apache
  • This the homepage of NCC ARMY of SVCE and i ve rewritten this thrice before releasing
  • i ve designed the creatives as well
  • Home page of NCC training,it has multimedia content
  • The NCC cadet can learn everything online . Almost all things that are taught during a parade are available here .
  • There is also a section which shows how to put your NCC shoes and Uniform
  • The content below is a SWF format video that loops like a GIF
  • The below video shows how to do Foot Marching in a NCC parade
